SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class GameLobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.GameLobby
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameLobby extends Object implements Serializable
Class GameLobby is the class that represents the game lobby of a single game. It contains all the players that are in the game lobby: who created the game and who want to join the game, when it reaches the number of players wanted, it starts the game and creates a new game controller and a new model view for the game itself.
See Also:

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addPlayerToGame(String nickname, Connection connection)
    Method that adds a player to the game lobby if it is not full yet and sends a message to the player that wants to join the game lobby as confirmation
    void
    changePlayerInActive(String nickname, Connection connection)
    Method to change the player from disconnected to active in the game lobby: if he is the only player in the game lobby, it sends a message to the player to notify him that he is the only player in the game lobby, if he is not the only player in the game lobby, it sends a message to all the players in the game lobby to notify them that the player reconnected, if the game is ended, it sends a message to the player to notify him that the game is ended
    void
    changePlayerInDisconnected(String nickname)
    Method to change the player from active to disconnected in the game lobby if he is the only player in the game lobby, it sends a message to the player to notify him that he is the only player in the game lobby, if he is not the only player in the game lobby, it sends a message to all the players in the game lobby to notify them that the player disconnected, if the game is ended, it sends a message to the player to notify him that the game is ended

    • changePlayerInActive

      public void changePlayerInActive(String nickname, Connection connection) throws IOException
      Method to change the player from disconnected to active in the game lobby: if he is the only player in the game lobby, it sends a message to the player to notify him that he is the only player in the game lobby, if he is not the only player in the game lobby, it sends a message to all the players in the game lobby to notify them that the player reconnected, if the game is ended, it sends a message to the player to notify him that the game is ended
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player to change
      connection - the connection of the player to change
      Throws:
      IOException - if there are problems with the connection

      nickname - the nickname of the player to change
      Throws:
